title: Poly Track
description: A low-poly racing game where speed is everything. Master the tracks, set new records, and experience pure arcade racing bliss.

title: Short Life
description: Survival is the only goal. Dodge traps, spikes, and saws to keep your limbs attached in this physics-based obstacle course.

title: Run 3
description: The legendary tunnel runner. Leap through space, rotate your perspective, and keep running as the floor falls away.

title: Cookie Clicker
description: The original idle game where you bake an astronomical amount of cookies.

title: Flappy Bird
description: The classic challenge, now permanently embedded directly in the Algebra Practise hub.
